price: ߏ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߣߊ߲߬ߝߟߏ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߫ ߢߵߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߕߎߡߊ ߊ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
